If you are concerned about 
any of these points, speak to

10
124
Tips for breastfeeding
• Make sure your baby is well 
attached to your breast 
(see pictures on page 122). 
This will help your body 
make the right amount of 
milk and stop your breasts 
getting sore. The more you 
breastfeed your baby, the 
more milk you will produce. 
When	your	baby	comes	off	
the	first	breast,	offer	the	
second. It doesn’t matter if 
they are not inte
